channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - September 13, 2019
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-september-13-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
We've got AP sessions from great games like *Nahual* in the *Gauntlet Comics* universe, *World Wide Wrestling* in our own Gauntlet League, further tales of the Kingsport world in *Monsterhearts*, and many more! Thanks to everyone who facilitated and played, and if you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://discourse.funtimers.club/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
